name: space:CAKES
description:
A sliding, repeating and funky puzzler about reaching the delicious cupcake across your spaceship. You play as a cute alien, who has a limited amount of steps. He turns green when he  can walk freely, but once he rans out of steps, he becomes red and can only push on crates. Luckily, some crates contain +1 or +2 steps for him, as long as he can push one into a laser.

WASD or Arrows for movement. R to restart level, Z to undo a move.

Design, code and graphics by Aaro Perämaa.

Sound and music by Lukas Ekberg
